Elizabeth (Betty) Ryan (nke bụbu Tylko) bụ onye mmepe egwuregwu na onye mmemme America
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na General Computer Corporation (GCC) n'afọ ndị 1980 ma bụrụ onye ọrụ nke itoolu na nwanyị mbụ na-eme egwuregwu vidio na GCC
Ọ haziri egwuregwu arcade Atari, Inc
nke afọ 1982 Quantum yana ịrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu maka Atari 2600, Atari 5200, na Atari 7800.
Ryan nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Injinia na Applied Sciences na Mahadum Harvard ma bụrụ onye otu klas nke afọ 1980.
Ryan haziri egwuregwu vidio Atari arcade Quantum, nke General Computer Corporation (GCC) mepụtara maka Atari, Inc. Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nke itoolu na nwanyị mbụ mepụtara egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Carol Ryan Thomas, ka e mesịrị were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-anwale egwuregwu na onye na-edozi egwuregwu.

Mgbe Quantum gasịrị, Ryan rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu maka Atari 2600, Atari 5200, na Atari 7800, gụnyere Pole Position, Dig Dug, GCC's unreleased version of Millipede for the Atari 7800. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na AtariLab agụmakwụkwọ software.
Ryan ekwuola maka ọrụ ya na mmepe egwuregwu maka American Classic Arcade Museum. Kemgbe afọ 2003, ya na nwa ya nwoke, John Tylko, na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe weebụ.
